description:
Zofis summons his Ancient mamodo army to take down Zatch and his team. Weak and out of strength from within, the team finds themselves in a tight spot.  Suddenly a familiar spell rings out…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sherry Kedakaki Rondo, Sakuretsu Baberuga Grabidon
The Return of Sherry and Brago
シェリー気高き輪舞 炸裂バベルガ・グラビドン
